description: Implement Table as compound component (~350 lines) following Menu patterns. Includes: Table root, Table.Header (column headers with sorting), Table.Body (virtualized rows), Table.Row (selectable with checkbox), Table.Cell, Table.Column (resizable, sortable). Uses Object.assign pattern, frozen B constant with CSS variable slots, TableContext for selection/sort state, useTooltip integration, drag-drop reordering via useGesture, keyboard navigation, and data-* attributes (data-selected, data-sorted, data-resizing). Reference: menu.tsx for selection pattern, RAC Table docs for column/row structure.
title: Table component
